attributes.action: Remove Ukraine from the UK visa national list.
attributes.additional_details:
This would allow fast entry to the U.K. within the current visa system. It would allow Ukrainians to enter the U.K. in the same way many other nationals come to visit our country. Countries that are not part of the list and therefore enter without prior entry clearance include: USA, Malaysia, most of Europe.

Anyone not on the visa national list is able to come to the U.K. after passport checks and then be processed (checking they meet the rules for entry) when they reach the U.K.
attributes.background: Remove Ukraine from the visa national list, allowing them entry without prior entry clearance.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609530

The above petition was debated by MPs on Monday 14 March, because it got over 100,000 signatures. Read a transcript of the debate: https://hansard.parliament.uk/Commons/2022-03-14/debates/7F61EFBF-4EDF-43C3-A739-AA1FFA3F63CE/UkrainianRefugees
